title: STAT+: As its immunology work draws attention, Sanofi also pushes forward in rare disease
description: An experimental Sanofi drug helped improve the neurological problems seen with a rare disease, as the company plans to seek approval.
content: An experimental Sanofi drug helped improve the neurological problems seen with a rare disease, as the company plans to seek approval.
